sqlMap.insert:
insert into t_default_extract_result (Id, TaskId, Duration, WebsiteId, Status, Remark, Url, UniqueSign,UniqueMd5, ResultType, StoragePath, CreatedAt) values (#id#, #taskId#, #duration#, #websiteId#, #status#, #remark#, #url#, #uniqueSign#,#uniqueMd5#, #resultType#, #storagePath#, now())
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS id
sqlMap.update: update t_default_extract_result set TaskId = #taskId#, WebsiteId = #websiteId#, Status = #status#, Remark = #remark#, Url = #url#, UniqueSign = #uniqueSign#, ResultType = #resultType#, StoragePath = #storagePath#, UpdatedAt = now() where Id = #id#
